column4: i need a mouse in my TSC!!! Ive done all the hard work... does anyone know how to resolve the mouse pointer not showing through?
it shows when accessing ubuntu from xp... but when i access xp from ubuntu... no mouse... =(
you might want to try the ##windows channel and see if they have any suggestions.  You don't seem to be getting much interest/input here.  Good luck.
ya, not tryin to bug... just hopin i catch someones eye... and to be honest... didnt know about ##windows !   I greatly appreciate it!
